vinteng:item-vepressmold-plate-*: Plate mold for Metal Press machine.
vinteng:itemdesc-vepressmold-plate-*: Use in a Metal Press to make plates. Mold will wear out over time, durability depends on material.
vinteng:item-vepressmold-gear-*: Gear mold for Metal Press machine.
vinteng:itemdesc-vepressmold-gear-*: Use in a Metal Press to make gears. Mold will wear out over time, durability depends on material.
vinteng:gui-metal-press-mold: Place a mold in the mold slot.
